key.name: current-session
key.summary: Path of the current session file
key.description: Points to the file, which is used to keep track of the current session, or an empty string, if the current session is intermediate.

key.name: horizontal-scroll-in-preview
key.summary: Enable horizontal scrolling via scroll wheel in PDF preview?
key.description: Controls whether the scrolling is limited to vertical scrolling.

key.name: horizontal-scroll-in-preview-threshold
key.summary: How distinct has a horizontal scroll to be?
key.description: Discards horizontal shake when scrolling down the PDF preview.

key.name: fit-preview-zoom-after-build
key.summary: Reduce zoom automatically to fit affected block into screen after build?
key.description: Allows reducing the PDF preview's current zoom automatically as necessary, if the selected area doesn't fit entirely into the screen.
